name: game-awards-api
description: A RESTful API for board game awards data - similar to OMDB API but for board games

scripts.build: npm run build:meta && npm run build:functions
scripts.db:migrate: export PATH="/opt/homebrew/opt/libpq/bin:$PATH" && export PGPASSWORD=$PGPASSWORD && psql -h ep-quiet-glade-adjp9y5d-pooler.c-2.us-east-1.aws.neon.tech -U $PGUSER -d neondb -f neon/schema.sql
scripts.db:seed: export PATH="/opt/homebrew/opt/libpq/bin:$PATH" && export PGPASSWORD=$PGPASSWORD && psql -h ep-quiet-glade-adjp9y5d-pooler.c-2.us-east-1.aws.neon.tech -U $PGUSER -d neondb -f neon/seed.sql

author: Greg Robleto
